Class Song

java.lang.Object
  Song

public class Song
extends java.lang.Object

A song is made up of one or more measures.

Version:
3.27.2018
Author:
Annabelle Perng

Constructor Summary
Song(int tempo)
          Constructor for objects of class Song.
 
Method Summary
 void addMeasure()
          Adds one measure to the end of the song.
 void changeTempo(int newTempo)
          Changes the tempo of the song.
 Measure getMeasure(int measureNumber)
          Retrieves a measure of the song.
 int getMeasureCount()
          Returns the current length of the song, otherwise known as the number of measures in the song.
 java.lang.String getTitle()
          Retrieves the song's title.
 void playSong()
          Plays through the whole song.
 void removeMeasure(int measureNumber)
          Removes one measure from the song.
 void setTitle(java.lang.String songTitle)
          Sets a title for the song.
 void showMeasure(int measureNumber)
          Changes the display so that a specified measure of the song is shown within the editor.

Constructor Detail

Song

public Song(int tempo)
Constructor for objects of class Song.

Parameters:
tempo - the tempo to play the song at
Method Detail

addMeasure

public void addMeasure()
Adds one measure to the end of the song. Displays the measure that was just added.

changeTempo

public void changeTempo(int newTempo)
Changes the tempo of the song.

Parameters:
newTempo - the new tempo to play the song at

getMeasure

public Measure getMeasure(int measureNumber)
Retrieves a measure of the song.

Parameters:
measureNumber - the index of the measure to be retrieved
Returns:
the measure at measureNumber

getMeasureCount

public int getMeasureCount()
Returns the current length of the song, otherwise known as the number of measures in the song.

Returns:
the length of the song

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
Retrieves the song's title.

Returns:
the String form of the song's title - if the song is unnamed, an empty String will be returned

playSong

public void playSong()
Plays through the whole song.

removeMeasure

public void removeMeasure(int measureNumber)
Removes one measure from the song. Displays the last measure in the song.

Parameters:
measureNumber - the index of the measure to be removed

setTitle

public void setTitle(java.lang.String songTitle)
Sets a title for the song. Songs do not have to have titles.

Parameters:
songTitle - the new name for the song

showMeasure

public void showMeasure(int measureNumber)
Changes the display so that a specified measure of the song is shown within the editor.

Parameters:
measureNumber - the index of the measure to be displayed
